H

Hangman - Class in <Unnamed>
This Hangman class is a class that have the methods and the logic for the basic hangman game.
Hangman(String) - Constructor for class Hangman
This Hangman constructor has a parameter of type String which is the word to be guessed by player.
hangman1 - Variable in class HangmanGUI
hangman1 is an instance variable of type Hangman that contains the basic methods for the hangman game
HangmanFigure - Class in <Unnamed>
This class generates the hangman figure for the HangmanGUI This class extends from the JPanel class.
HangmanFigure() - Constructor for class HangmanFigure
This is a no argument constructor for the class
hangmanFigure - Variable in class HangmanGUI
hangmanFigure is an instance variable of type HangmanFigure that generates the hangman figure
HangmanGUI - Class in <Unnamed>
This HangmanGUI class is the class that creates the game's interface This class extends JFrame class and has an anonymous inner class and an inner class for the action event handling component.
HangmanGUI() - Constructor for class HangmanGUI
This no argument constructor for this class will instantiate the instance variables and add them to the JFrame.
HangmanGUI.HangmanHandler - Class in <Unnamed>
this private inner class is the class that handles any action event performed by textfield1.
HangmanHandler() - Constructor for class HangmanGUI.HangmanHandler
 
HangmanMainClass - Class in <Unnamed>
This is the driver class for the HangmanGUI.
HangmanMainClass() - Constructor for class HangmanMainClass
